long_description: The Ride Lasso snowboard boots offer lasting comfort and on-the-fly adjustments, and are built for your all-mountain adventures. Round up your friends and head to the hill. Boa(R) Coiler lacing system, with ankle and cable guides along entire edge of eyestays, distributes closure force evenly for a dialed-in fit that won't loosen up. The Coiler scoops up loose cable when entering and exiting the boot; put your foot in, pull back on the tongue, twist the reel a few times and you're off. Centered over the forefeet, Closer Lace Guides drive power down low and even out the lace tension throughout the entire boot; molded 3D tongues add support and comfort. Supportive Intuition(TM) Support liners with enhanced high-density foam are body-heat activated over several days or immediately custom-formable on in-store pipe heaters. Liners securely wrap feet and include internal and external, heel-locking J-bars with cored ankle pockets; 3D-formed, dual-density EVA footbeds provide anatomic support. External J-bars increase heel hold; Lock Down speed laces tighten liners quickly and easily for a supportive, nonslip fit. Lasso boots are built with Blown Light Apex outsoles;100% phylon gives a barefoot feel, gel pods in heels cushion landings and ice pick inserts grip snow and ice.
